name: Shielco Watersave Ltd
description:
SHIELCO WATERSAVE LTD has main activities the development and application of technologies relating to environment protection.
Our experience and the skills that we have developed throughout our work provide to our customers the best technical solution with quality products at competitive prices.
We introducing the revolutionary product Aqua2use® GWTS 500 which is a unique innovative greywater treatment system which collects the domestic wastewater from showers, baths, laundry, hands wash basins and treat them into reusable water quality for re-use  indoor - toilet flushing, laundry as well as outdoor - car wash, general cleaning and garden irrigation. 
We believe that our today's action determined how the world is going to be tomorrow!
